file_content.text: If you've got everything you need, I can take you down to the surface.
Commander Rans is waiting for me at the Jedi Temple.
I bet he's not. Darth Arho's troops have taken over the temple. Commander Rans and the others barely made it out alive.
Had to set up their command post in an unsecured field. You need to speak to Commander Rans, I can take you there.
Just get any supplies you need before we head down. They won't be able to help you out on the surface.
Take me down to the surface.
Get on board and hold tight. It's going to be a bumpy ride.
It'll be tight, but I think I can squeeze everybody in. Hold on--it's going to be a bumpy ride.
I still need to get a few things.
I'll be here when you're ready.
